about_the_game:
Spartan's Spear is a puzzle game about combat where you are a mighty Spartan battling forces of evil.

Battle enemies with your mighty spear


Use your weapon's reach to your advantage and defeat your foes from a safe distance!

Navigate tight spaces


While your spear allows you to attack safely, it can also be a hindrance when moving around. Think about where you move and how!

Loot


Break chests to find items to aid you and iron which you can use to upgrade or buy new equipment.

Infinite undos


Made a mistake? Take back as many moves as you want!

The Greek Gods have chosen you!

Unknown evil power consumed the island of Tsougria. The Gods sense great danger, but even their all seeing eyes are blind to what occurred there. They chose you, the mightiest Spartan in all of Greece to investigate and solve this troubling situation.
